price: اى زما د زندان ملګرو! آيا ډېر بېلا بېل معبودان غوره دي كه هماغه يو برلاسى الله؟
arabic: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yāṣāḥibayi al-sij'ni a-arbābun mutafarriqūna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
